IpTracker.IpChangedBody: Hey Mr King Krust!{newLine}{newLine}Seems like your IP address has been changed to: {ipAddress}.{newLine}{newLine}Also, have a great day!
IpTracker.IpNotChangedBody: Hey Mr King Krust!{newLine}{newLine}Your IP address is still: {ipAddress}.{newLine}{newLine}Also, have a great day!
